features.title: Data Extraction from Excel File
features.description: The app allows users to upload an Excel file containing data such as recipient names, email addresses, and other relevant information. It uses pandas (a popular python library) to extract and parse the data from the Excel file, making it accessible for further processing.

features.title: Email Template Personalization
features.description: The app let the user define an HTML email template with placeholders for personalized content. It checks for particular formatting to dynamically populate the placeholders in the email template with the data extracted from the Excel file. The resulting personalized email content is generated for each recipient, making the emails unique and tailored to each individual.

features.title: SMTP Server Integration for Email Sending
features.description: The app includes functionality to establish a connection to an SMTP server for sending emails. It allows users to configure the SMTP server details, such as host, port, authentication credentials, etc., to establish a successful connection. It uses an SMTP client library or module to send personalized emails, providing the necessary email details (recipient, subject, HTML content) for each email.

faqs.question: Who this tool is for?
faqs.answer: This tool is designed for entrepreneurs, sales professionals, and business owners who want to enhance their outreach efforts and connect with potential clients.

faqs.question: How will I connect my email service provider?
faqs.answer: The connection process is simple and explained in the guide provided to you. If you face any issues, reach out to us at support[at]emails-automated[dot]com.

faqs.question: Do I need to know HTML?
faqs.answer: No, you do not need to know HTML. You can simply convert your body into HTML using any online tool.

faqs.question: How can I improve my cold email response rates?
faqs.answer: To improve response rates, focus on personalization, relevance, and a clear call-to-action. Research your prospects beforehand to understand their pain points and tailor your message accordingly.

faqs.question: Can I track my open-rates?
faqs.answer: No, at the moment you can not track open-rates. But we are working on it and will be available soon for wordpress website users.

faqs.question: Can I send automated follow-ups?
faqs.answer: No, at the moment you can not send any automated follow-ups. Depending on the response we will add this feature in the future.
